description:
Discover new anime & manga and manage your Kitsu library.
Kitsune is an unofficial android app for Kitsu.app (Kitsu.io). It allows you to browse anime & manga and track your progress.

Features:
* Explore and search anime and manga, even without an account
* View anime and manga details including episodes/chapters and characters
* Manage your anime & manga library
* Update your Kitsu profile and account settings
* Material 3 Design
* Home screen widget
